reviews.review: Güzel bir oyun nokta.
Esse jogo é bom d+ Jisus Cruaisti mano se de imaginar já to com vontade de jogar, recomendo, compra e joga e se não gostar pede reembolso e já era !!
Sigue siendo una kk, pero bueno keselevaser
A really good competitive game that doesn't have a broken operator called Ela and shitty hit registration.

Altta yazan eski düşüncemdi şuanda animasyon özürlü bir oyun olmasına karşı oyunu öğrendikçe katillerle dalga geçmeye başlıyorsunuz solo biraz zor ama arkadaslarınızla oynadıgınızda katillerin içinden geçiyorsunuz denge harita ve perklere göre değişiyor sadece katil tabiki güçlü ama 4 v 1 olarak düşünürsek bir sıkıntı yok oyun güzel :D



yetkililerden biri görür umarım arkadas hangi psikopat ruh hastası yapıyorsa katilleri hayatta kalanlarıda başka bir  psikopat a verin o yapsın adalet yok oyundan ben kendimi parçalıyorum kaçmak için adamın efor sarfetmesine gerek kalmadan yakalıyor katiller sizden hızlı kosuyor zaten bide ekstra bi dünya özellikleri var bizde garibim işte fake ata ata kaçmaya çalışıyoruz ama bir yere kadar match makin i berbat zaten oyunun ona diyecek hiç bişeyim yok rica ediyorum dengeleyin katil ve hayattakalan karakterlerin gücünü yine güçsüz olsun survivor lar ama bukadar geri kalmasın adam eğilince aurası kayboluyor kalkınca tek atıyor kafana trap koyuyor çözmeye çalısınca yerin belli oluyor hele hallowen piçi onu anlatmaya gerekyok bide son zamanlarda bitane hayaletten bozma kahpe bir kadın var katil oyun zevkimin içine sıçıyor oyun güzel efsane türünde zirve ama adalet lütfennn

I like this game because it gives you a sense of adrenaline from the killer chasing you (not sure if it applies to everyone who plays this game). It is also VERY dramatic when you get someone of a hook because you know that the killer is going to go back to the hook and you will either get chased or avoid the killer completely.

Arkadaşlar oyun gerçekten efsane, hele de 3 kişi oynuyorsanız ama oyunun öyle bir loading ekranı var ki abartısız yarım saat bekliyorsunuz ve oyuna girip 1 dk sonra ölüyorsunuz oyun bulmak çok zor ve bir oyuncu loading sırasında çıktığı zaman ömür billah o oyuna giremiyorsunuz. Bunlara ek olarak maç eşleştirmesi çok kötü siz oyuna yeni başlamışken karşıya oyunun hayat kadını olmuş bir katil atıyor. bir de sessiz katil var onu hiç anlayamadım arkanızdan yaklaştığında hiç bir kalp atışı duyamıyorsunuz bu da oyunun mantığına ters ve sadece sinir ediyor. ama manyak gibi oynuyoruz anlamadım.


2019 - REZALET
Jogo muito bom para jogar com os amigos como sobrevivente e um otimo singleplayer para jogar como assassino.

Chills down the spine, the gut wrenching feeling your being watched, and the heart throb of running down Elm St. from the scariest killer from your childhood is the best way to describe the feeling this game promotes....being early access i refuse to be as harsh as others have on this game although the connectivity issues do irritate even the ghandi's of gaming....but overall great potential and im excited to see what they do next with Dead By Daylight.  Maybe Freddy in the Boiler room nightmare??? Or chucky with the toy factory???? OR LEATHERFACE IN THE TEXAS CHAINSAW MASSACRE!!!!!!!

And if my ideas get used just an honorable mention please lol <{~_~}>

El juego en si es divertido, las mecanicas me gustan, sin embargo, el problema es que no puedo jugar. El emparejamiento si eres un superviviente es ya no malo, en ocasiones inexistente, eso si estas solo. Al menos yo, intentando jugar con amigos es practicamente imposible, se puede llegar uno a esperar hasta media hora para conseguir entrar en una partida en la que el host se irá para poder volver a esperar para entrar en otra partida.

En resumen, un buen juego al que no puedo jugar. Espero que solucionen esto.
好游戏

I love this game. But apparently after every game i play the only way i can play more is to restart the game, all due to the so called "anti-cheat: error code 1". I don't know why your stupid anti-cheat program appearently only works for 1 game, but its a shitty way to program, and i do not know anyone who would want to go through all this bullshit to be able to play maybe 2 games per hour. Fix your shit and i will come back, its unfortunate you already took my money with your much more important content packs.

este juego es una puta basura pero he jugado 350 hrs es asqueroso los facecampers y los muertos de puta madre

Dead by Daylight is a strong 7.5/10. I do enjoy playing swf, but it's more fun and interesting playing alone with three strangers.
Spannend und immer wieder eine Herausforderung. Purer Nervenkitzel! Ich liebe es! Es kommt immer wieder was neues und ich kann einfach nicht genug bekommen😍

BEST GAME ON STEAM! PLEASE CONTINUE TO ADD CONTENT :) BOUGHT THIS GAME FOR FOUR FRIENDS
Best game ever

This game may get a ton of bad reviews and the community may knock the devs a lot but lets be honest, there is a still a ton of people playing this game. Why is that you say, well because it is a really fun game that is even better to play with friends. Even though its the same objective each time you jump in, its just addicting to continue and load up for the next. Speaking from mainly playing as survivor, its a lot of fun trying to dodge the killer, sneak around, power the generators and escape, it really is a rush!

Now, to be honest there are some bugs that pop up every so often. I see these bugs maybe once every 10 games. By bugs I mean, killer having 2 different killer moves (Nurse with a chainsaw for example) is that game breaking, sure, am I still going to go and load up for another, you bet your a**!

This game is great. It has issues to work out but we are all on the holiday season right now. If we give the devs a chance I think they will continue to improve the game. Get this game while its on sale!
J'ai adoré passé à travers le sol en désamorçant un piège...
Muy buen juego.
It's okay.
Maybe its becouse i am in EU, but still this matchmaking is focked... and the time you need to get to a singe game... :/
норм игра

Dead By Daylight. Ein Spiel für mehrere Horrorbegeisterte Freunde. Man lässt sich jagen oder man geht selbst auf die Jagd. Man kann zwischen 2 Modes unterscheiden. Entweder als Survival und versucht dem Killer zu entkommen oder aber man jagd die Survivals und versucht alle aufzuhalten. Ein kleines lustiges Horrorgame, was in allen belangen zeigt, was Horror sein kann. Allerdings, sollte man auch abwägen können, denn Camper mag keiner. ;) Man sollte mit seinen Opfern ruhig noch etwas spielen, anstatt, sie tod zu campen. ;)
LAG
Very good game.
Me falla el menu :(
Bellissimo! Non ho ancora trovato nessun bug, il gioco mi intrattiene molto :D Consigliato.
good game

Kdyby to fungovalo, je to naprosto skvělá hra... Ale na placenou hru se to buguje až moc často.
Bugs too often,

Sure would be nice if they could fix all the glitches. As a survivor, I'll click "Join Lobby" something like 8 times over and over before it finally puts me in a game, then half the time the other 3 survivors dc/don't load at all. 

Also, when playing with friends, it'd be nice if it kept us in a group instead of having to reinvite every time. Playing with friends always means really long queue times as well...

The game is a ton of fun when it works...

1 Маньяк которй хочит всегда и везде убить 4 выжовших.Когда жертвы заведут 5 генераторов и збегут открыв варота то тогда проигрывает маньяк.А если маньяк поймает свою жертву он должен ее или (его зависит за кого вы играете) повесить на крюк которые спавнятся в рамдомных местах и так когда маньяк повесит всех выжовшых он атоматически выигрывает.
It is a good game for Coop.So call you your friends and start play. 10/10

An sich ist das Spiel echt super. Es macht viel spaß es mit Freunden zu spielen. Möchte man es aber mit Freunden spielen, muss man das zu einer Zeit tun wo viele Personen dieses Spiel spielen. Abends gibt es sehr wenig Killer, und mit einer 3er oder 4er Gruppe fndet man nur in den seltensten Fällen ein Killer. Findet man doch einen Killer, ist er zu 90% ein Camper-Killer. Dann macht das Spiel auch keinen Spaß mehr. Hat man doch mal das Glück (allein oder in einer Gruppe) einen Fairen Killer zu haben ist das Spiel auch interessant und aufregend. Ich spiele selbst die Killerrolle und man KANN es ohne zu campen schaffen das Spiel für sich zu entscheiden. Klar gibt es spiele, wo die Überlebenden besser sind und man nicht alle oder auch mal keinen tötet. Dennoch ist das kein Grund mit dem Campen anzufangen. 
Ich erhoffe mir durch weitere Spieler, die sich dieses Spiel zu legen, Faire Mit-/und Gegenspieler zu haben.
TOP!

dead by daylight is a top secret torture method that is developed by behavior. this game is very bad and i don't recommend it to anyone you have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game thankfully spending about 30 minutes in dead by daylight makes you retarded in dead by daylight you can visit very interesting locations like ormond or haddonfield. nothing else.

Idee ist zwar super. Leider ist die technische Umsetzung katastrophal. Die andauernden Verbindungsabbrüche, Lags und LoadingScreens-of-Death sind eine Qual. Und jedes Mal wenn ich das Spiel starte, bin ich diese Fehler nach wenigen Minuten bereits wieder Leid und schließe das Spiel wieder. Diese Fehler treten bei ALLEN meinen Bekannten auf - und mir vermiesen sie definitiv den Spielspaß.

AYUDAAAAAAAA!!!
Ya se lo bueno que es ete juego, ya lo he jugado y la verdad despues de verlo sin duda lo queria comprar....
Pero hubo un problema que no me esperaba y que me desconserto bastante porque no he podido solucionarlo:
"DX11 feature level 11.0 is required to run the engine" 
Y no:
-No tengo ningun problema con el espacio de memoria
-No tengo ningun problema con el RAM
-Tampoco tengo problema con el procesador
El problema es el sitema operativo: Tengo windows 10; por lo tanto tengo el DX12.
No entiendo?!
Si alguien sabe como pasar DX11 a windows 10 o el como activarlo NO DUDE EN PONERLO EN LOS COMETARIOS.
Por favor! le estaria eternamente agradecido! GRACIAS!

Aviso: Esto es una review positiva

Si eres un jugador "casual" y te quieres desahogar una tarde matando gente fácilmente, éste es tu juego. Y si eres un friki mejor, así pagarás gustosamente por los dlc que incluyen tus killers favoritos de la tele y te facilitarán las matanzas con sus nuevas habilidades. Si aún así te resulta complicado matar, consulta las fabulosas guías del juego. Están llenas de consejos superútiles de gente muy experimentada con mucho tiempo libre. Y si no, campear siempre funciona muy bien. Y no dudes en escribir tus quejas en los foros del juego. Los desarrolladores lo leerán y harán los cambios necesarios para seguir facilitándote las cosas para que puedas matar a tu gusto y sin que nada ni nadie te lo pueda impedir. Y todo ello por menos de 80€. Si eres pobre, o tus padres no son generosos con la paga semanal, espera a que lo pongan de oferta. ¡Por menos de 40€ te lo llevarás todo!
ахуенно

Bis auf das es kaum möglich ist über "schnelles Spiel" eine Runde zu finden, ist es ein wirklich sehr gelungener Vorreiter für Spiele dieser Art. Kleiner Tip für Neueinsteiger wählt nie schnelles Spiel sondern wählt Überleben mit freunden und startet das Spiel alleine, ihr werdet fast immer in einer Lobby landen die kurz darauf startet !

This game's.. buggy. Developers are doing everything they can, so the game would be easy for the killer and really hard for the survivors. Killers crying about sprint burst perk or survivors jumping through the same window over and over again? No problem! Perk's gonna be nerfed and window blocked after certain amount of jumps. Survivors are pissed about campers or killers with bad internet? Meh.
This is one of the few games in which killer can give you lags, face camp you or even use cheats :) Oh, we can't forget the killers purposely made to be OP. ^^
*in the corner, waiting for the full version of Friday13th*
But still, if you want to hear your friends rage quitting all over the place and you don't mind spending another fifty dollars on DLC's with OP killers and mostly useless survivors - I recommend the game. :) It can be fun if you don't take it seriously. Really, don't take it that way, just don't. Make fun of it and enjoy all ridiculous situations, it's better than being angry at it. :3

Per il resto un gioco dove ci vuole strategia e bravura, ma soprattutto non è pay to win

I want to recommend the game because it's pretty fun in its core. Both survivor and killer gameplay are really fun, it's a joy to play... when it works.

The main downside is simple: this is the most buggy game I ever played. The dev team seems really motivated, follows the game a lot, updates it a lot, always adding content and balancing stuff. But I don't know, it must be poorly coded or something, there are so many bugs. Always. When they fix 5 bugs, 10 other bugs appear, or worse, return after being fixed for 2 weeks. This is like this since the game is out unfortunately.

Good game

This game has changed a lot in the 3 years since I purchased it.

Now Killer is more like "fight off 4 relentless teenagers as they try to touch your gens. You're the gen guard. Sometimes you can exterminate these pesky teenagers if they touch your gens too much. They will probably stab you, drop a box on your head, blind you. Its rough."

And survivor is more like "NO HEALING TOUCH THE GENS TOUCH THEM FAST"

I'm just glad there's no more "trapper placing traps under hooks to catch someone lucky enough to get off, or so the savior has to untrap them every time" or Myers face-camping in tier 3 since the game now rewards very little in terms of bloodpoints or rank for this sort of play.

The addition of tutorials for newer players and the adjustments to the BP/ranking system has done a lot of good and I am pleasantly surprised. After a 2 year break, I can say Dead by Daylight has evolved so much and I am looking forward to the future of this game.

Edit: Devs fixed the bugs that were pissing me off last time I changed to downvote. Upvote again for now.

O jogo em si é muito bom, ou pelo menos tinha o intuito de ser. Muitos bugs com algumas habilidades tanto de sobrevivente como de assassino ainda permanecem, uma demora absurda pra achar assassino depois das 22:00 deixam a desejar, muito lag proposital vindo de assassinos, algumas habilidades bugadas no modo Kill Your Friends.
Em alguns casos o jogo chega a te estressar, mas recomendo.

Alsooo hab einige Stunden hinter mir.Als endergebniss muss ich sagen wenn das team einigermasen gut ist hat man als killer abgeloooosstt. Warum?Weil wenn die Überlebenden immer im kreis oder die ganze zeit die paletten umschmeissen hat man so gut wie verlorne. Auch besonders wenn die ganzen Haken zerstört worden sind.Daher würde ich den Jungs dringend raten ein Update rausbringen wo viel weniger Palleten herumliegen. Das ein Fähigkeiten der Überlebenden gestrichen werden.
Super Hra

This game is absolute garbage. It's toxic AF, the players are toxic AF, and when they can break away from arguing over "Killer tunneled me, waaaaah" or "They flashlighted me, waaaaaah" it's just long enough to tea bag each other.

Getting over the fact that salty losers are going to be at least one in every game, then you can take into consideration that the game will randomly disconnect it's users. Then after the game DCs you, you get a 5 minute timeout.

No other game does this. It shows on your screen you escaped, and even appears to give BP, but then, you get punished....for wanting to play the game....WTF?

Then you can deal with waiting for a match for 15 minutes, only to get killed by Michael Myers in the first 5 minutes of the game because for some idiotic reason, the devs think it's balanced for the killer to instantly mori people.

Honestly, to hell with this game, play something better.

EDIT: To be fair, I ~want~ to like DbD. It makes it impossibly hard to do though.
这游戏之前是不推荐，因为各种无法启动游戏或者无法加入游戏房间。现在好多了，bug也少了。希望继续改进，只玩过三四次屠夫，只有一次分不够，其他几次分都够了，而且是一个技能都没有的屠夫，感觉屠夫很好上分，都不用挂人上树，挂上树了也不收尸，随便砍砍分就够了，四个人类全跑分也够了。人类好难。
THIS GAME IS F***ING HORRIBLE,  ITS LAGGING LIKE HELL AND YOU HAVE TO WAIT FOR A MATCH ABOUT 15 MINUTES, IT  LOOKS WELL FROM THE TRAILER, BUT ITS HORRBILE BELIVE ME GUYS.

Hře jako takové nemám co vytknout až na občasné bugy, ale ty nejsou nijak velký problém.
Hra jako taková má výborný koncept a pokud do ní autoři vloží ještě trochu svého času bude to "špičková" hra.

Ale jedna věc mě opravdu mrzí a štve......a to komunita. Je zde hrozně moc grieferů a camperů. Bohužel s těmito lidmi vývojáři nic nedělají. Jednoduše řečeno.....reporty apsolutně ignorují. A to je bohužel velký problém, protože potom narazíte pomalu každou druhou hru na nějakého "problematického" killera. Například: to si váš takhle The Hag pověsí a začne kolem vás kreslit 8 svých trapek a nejlépe si ještě vedle vás stoupne a čeká.....to samo o sobě je hrozná zbytečnost i pro killera, protože tím kazí ostatním celou hru a zase tolik bodů z toho mít nebude, protože v tu chvíli pro tohoto "obklíčeného" survivara stejně nikdo nepůjde (pro info: za umístění jedné trapky je jen 25 bloodpointů - což je velice málo). A nebo když jsme u těch camperů vyfasujete do hry killera, který vás jednou pověsí a bude vás jen facecampit.

Takže pokud máte extrémně silnou trpělivost tak vám tuto hru mohu vřele doporučit.
Pokud máte, ale s těmito "nemocnými" jedinci také problém tak doporučuji čekat a doufat, že se vývojáři probudí a začnou něco s touto komunitou dělat.

PS: Pokud jste si tuto hru opravdu koupili a čtete si tuto recenzi...tak bych vás chtěl požádat, aby jste se chovali rozumně a hráli jste "fairplay". 
Já například někoho pověsím, umístím trapku a jdu hledat další. Většinou stejně takto všechny pozabíjím a posledního survivara dovedu k poklopu a nebo k bráně a nechám ho utéci.
Nenutím vás, aby jste někoho nutně nechali utéct jako já, ale jen prostě hrajte tak, aby si tuto hru mohl užít každý naplno. -Rep -Rep +Rep

Разработчики, когда вы пофиксите файлы на получение всех перков?.

I spent more than 700 hours in this game. So, easy review, thumbs up, all said?

No. Since when I bought the game, number of bugs increased and bugs are more and more game breaking. Eg, with the release of last DLC many old bugs came back into game and new bugs had been introduced. Bugs like losing your local safe game file, so players lose all their progess. Bugs like abusing a glitch to stack perks or even switch perks from killer to survivor or from survivor to killer. This game is a bug invested mess. And the devs do... nothing.

So, it is a thumbs down. At this moment no one should buy this game.

[h1] 한때 내 중딩 시절을 앗아갔던 게임 [/h1]

ㆍ발전기 돌릴 때의 긴장감
ㆍ살인마와의 아슬아슬한 추격전
ㆍ탈출 타이밍의 긴박함
[spoiler]친구가 죽어갈때의 안도감[/spoiler]

과거 밸런스 ㅈ망겜의 시절을 지나 이제는 황밸로 안정된것 같습니다.

그래도 저는 무적의 쌍판자에 미친 쌍공속 시절이 더 재미있던거 같지만 지금도 여전히 재밌습니다.

고인물 망겜이라고 할 수 있지만 사실 맵 외우는건 어느 게임이나 기본 소양이니 뉴비 분들에게도 추천 합니다.
[b] 근데 살인마는 절대 하지마세요. 진짜 정신 나갈거 같음 [/b]

Неплохо

Bueno despues de haber "JUGADO" "2" horas he de decir que este juego esta sumamente bugged, si quieres buscar partida se buguea y hay que cerrarlo desde el administrador de tareas por que se queda en un bucle infinito de buscando partida y no pudes interactuar con el juego. Pero no esta nada mal, te lo pasas bien excepto cuando el asesino tiene el doble de Perks que tu y tu solo uno que es inutil. Tambien he de decir que he tenido que cambiar los parametros a EE.UU (New York) para poder encontrar una partida, otra de las cosas que me disgusta sería que sacan DLC'S y ni siquiera arreglan estos bugs que te amargan, pero a ver si con el tiempo lo solucionan, por lo demas el juego es divertido.
